WorkItem.Description: Hello, I just uploaded the 1.3.1 version and change my XrmServiceToolkit.js resource. But nothing work again event if I added the json2.js resource. Am I missing something ?

Comments.Message:
As discussed, I am currently in progress to investigate the issue with more test scenarios.

I will update shortly once it is ready.

Thanks for your submit of the issue and support.

Best Regards,
Jaimie

I have encountered the same issue using UR12. I have finally been able to get it work with cross-browser compatibility. I believe the issue was two-fold:
1: changed to
xmlString = (new XMLSerializer()).serializeToString(responseXml);// instead of responseXml[0]
in var xmlToString = function (responseXml) {...

2:in deserialize i changed all instances of:
.baseName to localName
.text to .textContent
the original properties didn't seem to exist when debugging.

Alex
